metadata.title: CVE-2024-12133 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw in libtasn1 causes inefficient handling of specific certificatedata. When processing a large number of elements in a certificate, libtasn1takes much longer than expected, which can slow down or even crash thesystem. This flaw allows an attacker to send a specially craftedcertificate, causing a denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: libtasn1-6 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
